item.title: Refactored the Client Libraries
item.description: There has been a pretty large refactor of the client libraries. As with any very early API it has taken some time using the library in the real world to gain an understanding of what works and what doesn't. This has shown that the current API for registering your services required a lot of boilerplate code. Also if you wanted to change a single setting it required you to set a lot of settings you would like to leave it as the defaults.
item.author: Tim Seaward

item.title: Documentation started
item.description: We have started a new documentation site with a new Logo!
item.author: Tim Seaward
